google_reviews.author: caitlin hepworth
google_reviews.review:
This place is awesome if you love mold and greedy landlords who do nothing when there are legitimate health and safety concerns in these units.

Congrats Meadow Wood! You are now one of the many bellingham slumlords taking advantage of people. Gold Star. But just one.

google_reviews.author: Crystal
google_reviews.review: Don't move here if you have a daughter

google_reviews.author: MackA Ken
google_reviews.review: This place is set in the northern end of bellingham with close access to numerous shopping outlets and Bellis Fair mall.  The surround area is lush Woodlands that during the right time of year you can expect to see wild deer grazing upon the grass.  All in all the apartments are nice and it is a fairly quiet complex.

google_reviews.author: Barbara Barb Casort
google_reviews.review: Visiting a friend I noticed well kept buildings and landscaping but tenents who regularly tossed trash toward dumpsters.  Weekends cars don't obey parking regulations and cigarette butts are not picked up in the smoking areas

google_reviews.author: Desirre Jeffords
google_reviews.review: If management clean up the place better it would be a better and safer place to live they don't take care of the disabled like they should or even the elderly

summary.text:
Good

Meadow Wood Townhomes has received positive feedback about its location and surrounding environment. Several user reviews highlight the beautiful, lush woodlands and accessibility to shopping areas, making it an attractive option for residents who enjoy nature and convenience. The spacious townhomes also contribute to the positive sentiment, offering ample space for families and individuals alike.

Some renters have praised the management, specifically noting that a particular landlord is responsive to tenant concerns, which significantly enhances the living experience. Positive reviews discuss how the management ensures that problems are addressed in a timely manner, showcasing a commitment to tenant satisfaction that many find reassuring. Overall, there is a sense of community fostered within the complex that enhances residents' quality of life.

Great

A number of reviews indicate that stakeholders appreciate the overall structural quality of the townhomes. Users have noted that the buildings are well-kept and the landscaping is aesthetically pleasing. Additions such as playgrounds and nearby trails provide recreational opportunities that enhance the community atmosphere, making it an attractive place for families.

Bad

Despite its positives, Meadow Wood Townhomes has garnered a fair share of negative feedback, particularly concerning management practices. Several users expressed frustration regarding the lack of responsiveness to serious maintenance issues, such as mold problems and safety concerns, which they felt were not adequately addressed. This has led to sentiments of dissatisfaction among renters who believe that these issues compromise their quality of life.

Ugly

The most serious complaints about Meadow Wood Townhomes revolve around allegations of neglectful management practices. Certain user reviews are particularly harsh, describing the complex as a “slum” and referencing landlords who appear indifferent to tenant health and safety issues. These comments raise significant concerns about living conditions within the townhomes, casting a shadow on the community's reputation.
